name: Of Swords
description:
You've done something awful.

You can't run from it.

So remember it.

Made for the Twine 10 Year Anniversary Jam.

-

I've never made a game before; Twine or otherwise.
But I love interactive fiction, and Twine is responsible for some of my favourite pieces of IF. 

So I thought, what the hell.

Let me know if there are any errors/bugs and I'll try to fix em!

Thank you for playing!
